articles.author: Liz Kocan
articles.title: Indiana vs. Notre Dame: How to watch NCAA Football this weekend - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The Indiana Hoosiers will play the Notre Dame Fighting Irish in the College Football Playoffs — here's what to know and how to tune in to the game.
articles.content:
Donovan Hinish and the Notre Dame Fighting Irish will play the Indiana Hoosiers in the College Football Playoffs this weekend, here's how to watch. (Melinda Meijer/ISI Photos/Getty Images)
